mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM oneday WHERE
odNo > 0

SELECT ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}) + rownum as odRn, odNo, odTitle, odContent, odName, odDate, odPlace, odTime, odPeople, odMc, odDeadline, odState, odWDate, mid, odImg FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, odNo, odTitle, odContent, odName, odDate, odPlace, odTime, odPeople, odMc, odDeadline, odState, odWDate, mid, odImg FROM ( SELECT * FROM oneday ORDER BY ODNO DESC ) WHERE
rownum <= #{amount} * #{pageNum} ORDER BY odNo DESC ) WHERE rn > #{amount} * ( #{pageNum} -1 )

SELECT odRn, odNo, odTitle, odContent, odName, odDate, odPlace, odTime, odPeople, odMc, odDeadline, odState, odWDate, mid, odImg, odReqNo, odReqTitle, odReqContent, odReqDate, odReqWin FROM ( SELECT rownum as odRn, odNo, odTitle, odContent, odName, odDate, odPlace, odTime, odPeople, odMc, odDeadline, odState, odWDate, mid, odImg, odReqNo, odReqTitle, odReqContent, odReqDate, odReqWin FROM ( SELECT od.odNo, od.odTitle, od.odContent, od.odName, od.odDate, od.odPlace, od.odTime, od.odPeople, od.odMc, od.odDeadline, od.odState, od.odWDate, od.mid, od.odImg, odr.odReqNo, odr.odReqTitle, odr.odReqContent, odr.odReqDate, odr.odReqWin FROM oneday od LEFT JOIN odreq odr ON od.odNo = odr.odNo WHERE odr.mid = #{mid} ORDER BY od.odNo DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 20 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oneday (odNo, odTitle, odContent, odName, odDate, odPlace, odTime, odPeople, odMc, odDeadline, odState, odWDate, mid, odImg) VALUES (oneday_seq.NEXTVAL, #{odTitle}, #{odContent}, #{odName}, #{odDate}, #{odPlace}, #{odTime}, #{odPeople}, #{odMc}, #{odDeadline}, 0, SYSDATE, #{mid}, NVL(#{odImg}, 'default.png'))
